reviews.review: This is a different game than CS:GO; that being said, headshots matter.
Оффициант! Почему в моем халве Counter Strike?

Одна из лучших игр всех времен,игра моего детства,да и просто легенда.Прошу без комментариев,шедвр.По этой игре должны равняться шутеры.Не играл 2 года,и вот сегодня зашел и увидел то что она ещё не умерла,вспомнил те тёплые вечера которые провел с ней,было бы время играл бы и по сей день)

Counter-Srike: Source

Well first of all, I played this first time ever just recently, I know I missed the old good CS:S times, better late than never, right?

Everyone who has played Counter-Srike games knows how this game works, but there is something I have to say. This is a bit easier than Counter-Strike: Global Offensive and a lot easier than Counter-Strike 1.6. The community in this game is pretty nice towards others, I have to say that.

Playing this on community servers like zombie hunting etc is really fun. This game is just so good, it has no over rated skins etc. It's made just to be played. I can not say anything negative about this, it is so good. My grade for this game is 9,5/10
иделальная кс.во многом лучше "го"были б тут скины в "го"  не заходил бы
Игра всех времён и всех народов которая соеденила поколения в одном
its not as good as Black Desert online though.

The only game where all the different national counter terrorism forces team up to kill every terrorist in the world 

11/10 would cry from being quick scoped by AWP again
Игра великолепная в разы лучше cs go

Da quando ho preso cs:s, mi ci sto flippando un casino...La grafica datata ma molto leggera è ancora accettabile, gli spray delle armi sono molto più semplici (parere mio).
Iniziato dalla Valve,finito dalla comunità.
Piccolissima nota negativa,ci sono tantissimi 11enni,nessun problema, sono bravi.Ma quando iniziano ad urlare nel microfono danno un po fastidio.
Nessun problema se parlano, ma come tutti (anche magari i 30enni) regolarsi un pò,sembrano logorroici.
In sostanza, il gioco è molto bilanciato e carino da giocare,con un qualsiasi pc, con i settaggi al minimo credo riusciate a giocarlo ad almeno a 30 fps...Il mio pc è una patata, ma con tutto al massimo tranne ombre e motion blur, mi va a 70+ fps.
A meno che io non faccia un backstab e mi droppano i frame a 20 :C
8.5/10
Отличная игра.Перечислю пару пунктов за:не требовательная к железу,а значит фпс большой,анимации игры быстрые(не такие долгие как cs go ,что меня дико раздрожает)
Афигительная игра,наконецто я купил её в стиме!)
Бессмертная игра)) в неё всегда будут играть люди. Сколько бы ни было ей лет))
CS:S is a great game and everyone agrees....OK you probably just bought this so you can get textures for Garry's Mod. So did I. I'm not proud of myself.
a nota de 1 a 100 claro que e 100 o melhor fps do mundo
好玩不氪金，服务器上也就那么点人，新鲜血液几乎没有了。画面可以接受，渣机带着一点都不卡

source sie chowa przy 1.6

Counter-Strike: Source é mais um ótimo jogo na franquia Counter-Strike. Apesar de ser um jogo velho ainda possiu gráficos agrádaveis, ótima jogabilidade e física, ambos com selo de qualidade Source. A única coisa que senti falta foi de uma trilha sonora marcante, mas isso não é de se levar muito em conta. Mesmo sendo o antecessor do CS: GO, CS: Source ainda vale a pena ser jogado, principalmente pra quem não tem um bom PC(como eu), os servidores nacionais ainda estão cheios e rendem uma boa diversão.

Minha nota: 8,8/10
It's only good for Gmod at this point.
I thought I had bought a CS game, turns out I bought Valve's version of Mario Party.
Its only fun because I can run this at 30+ fps
The game that brought me into the PC Master Race.... i will never forget you. I love you CS:S

这是个可以和BOT玩得不亦乐乎的游戏，以前我不知道steam玩的是盗版，就一直和BOT大战，非常有意思。从开始打不过简单电脑，到后来花式虐专家级电脑XD。现在是正版了，依旧是和BOT打，因为活人已经没有几个，服务器大部分都是空的。

优点：
配置需求很低，优化很好，画面很好。
          操作很简单经典
          弹道比较好控制（参考CSGO跪地三十发给对面造成十几伤害啥的QAQ）
          打BOT超级好玩。BOT又萌又厉害！

缺点：
似乎弹道有爆头修正，爆头率极高。说实话这很影响游戏体验，太容易秒（被）人（秒）。而且，我明明没有打头也没去拉枪，你就给我整个爆头击杀对面，直观感受也是怪。
          没有创意工坊，比较不方便
Лучшая игра из серии CS ( не считая CS 1.6)
Counter Stroke : Source of them all

Basically, a casual version of CS:GO. Or in other words, CS:GO without skins, ranks, and shetty updates.
Playability is better than CS:GO, but i play this less because of the lack of matchmaking, and weekly drops XD
